pages.text: To start, you'll want to find some bee nests. The vanilla ones only generate in forests, but the hives added in Complicated Bees can generate pretty much anywhere - in the jungle, in the desert, underground, and even in the Nether and End!

pages.title: Bee Nests
pages.text: Bee nests also glow, so you might find them easier at night!

pages.title: The Almighty Scoop
pages.text: Be careful, though - you'll need a special tool called a Scoop to collect the bees if you want to avoid crushing the bees and getting stung in retaliation for destroying their homes.
Just use the scoop to break a bee nest, and you'll get a princess, a couple drones, and maybe even a comb or two!
